QuestData.Title: Out For Delivery
QuestData.Description:
I tried to tell Vevesi that I could pull the wagon out of the mud.
But, no, he insisted on using magic to get it out... And now look what he's done.
<Hauler Bennet sighs.>
While I try to talk sense into Vevesi, can you run up the hill to the Basecamp and let Cataloger Wulferd know that he might need to ship another crate of camera supplies over from Boralus?
QuestData.LogDescription: Tell Cataloger Wulferd in the nearby basecamp that his supplies won't be arriving anytime soon.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Give Cataloger Wulferd in Dragonscale Basecamp the bad news.
